io.github.noeppi_noeppi.libx.crafting.ingredient

Class PotionIngredient

  • java.lang.Object
    • net.minecraft.item.crafting.Ingredient
      • io.github.noeppi_noeppi.libx.crafting.ingredient.PotionIngredient
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.util.function.Predicate<net.minecraft.item.ItemStack>

    public class PotionIngredient
extends net.minecraft.item.crafting.Ingredient
    An ingredient that checks for a potion on an item. Unlike EffectIngredient there must be exactly the potion given here and only registered potions can be used. CustomPotionEffects is ignored.

    Please check whether EffectIngredient matches your needs better as it does in most cases.
